title: [Ta'Illistim, Sylvar Wey]
description: The nearby belltower dominates the view from the wey, its lapis-tiled spire sparkling in the moonlight.  A merchant's cart, its linen canopy folded down, is packed up for the night.

The nearby belltower dominates the view from the wey, its lapis-tiled spire sparkling in the day's light.  A merchant nearby sells brightly colored ribbons from her cart, occasionally calling out her wares in a musical voice.
The neighboring bell tower dominates the view from the wey, its lapis-tiled spire sparkling in the moonlight.  Nearby, a merchant's cart, its linen canopy folded down, is packed up for the night.
The neighboring bell tower dominates the view from the wey, its lapis-tiled spire sparkling in the day's light.  Nearby, a linen-canopied merchant cart is pulled up along the side of the road.
